message.name: ERR_FV_INVESTIGATION_ALREADY_CLOSED
message.locale: The investigation is not 'Open', it cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_RESOLUTION_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: A resolution already exists for this investigation. Please modify the existing resolution.

message.name: ERR_RV_RESOLUTION_STATUS_NOT_INEDIT
message.locale: A resolution cannot be modified on an investigation which has a status of submitted, approved, or closed.

message.name: INF_NO_RESOLUTIONS_EXIST
message.locale: Resolutions do not exist for this type of investigation. Please contact your administrator

message.name: ERR_RV_APPROVE_RESOLUTION_STATUS_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Resolution cannot be approved. Only resolutions with a status of submitted can be approved.

message.name: ERR_RV_REJECT_RESOLUTION_STATUS_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Resolution cannot be rejected. Only resolutions with a status of submitted can be rejected.

message.name: ERR_FV_REJECTIONREASON_EMPTY
message.locale: Rejection reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_PARTICIPANT_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an investigation a participant must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVESTIGATION_CONFIGURATION_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: To create an investigation the investigation configuration of the relevant type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_BEFORE_INVESTIGATION_START_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be before the start date of this investigation type.

message.name: ERR_FV_START_DATE_BEFORE_RELATED_CASE_START_DATE
message.locale: Start date cannot be before the start date of the related case.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_CLOSED_INVESTIGATION
message.locale: A closed investigation cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_CASE_FV_INVALID_STATUS
message.locale: Case status must be "open" or "rejected".

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_CASE_FV_NO_RESOLUTION
message.locale: An active resolution must be created before an investigation case can be submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_RESOLUTION_FV_NO_ALLEGATION_FINDING
message.locale: A resolution cannot be created if there is no allegation with a finding for this investigation case.

message.name: ERR_REMOVE_RESOLUTION_FV_INVALID_CASE_STATUS
message.locale: A resolution cannot be removed if the case status is not 'Open' or 'Rejected'. The current status is '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_SUBTYPE_FOR_TYPE
message.locale: The subtype must be a subtype of the investigation type - '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBMITTED_INVESTIGATION
message.locale: A submitted investigation cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_CLOSE_SUBMITTED_INVESTIGATION
message.locale: A submitted investigation cannot be closed.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RESOLUTION_ADD_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: A resolution must not be added to a closed investigation case.
